arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Paris lineup according to the press: Lee or Mbaye?
arts.sum: This Wednesday, on the first matchday of the 2025-2026 UEFA Champions League group stage, Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 9 pm, CET). arts.ttl: PSG starts Champions League defense against Atalanta. Bayern-Chelsea, Ajax-Inter renew past finals
arts.sum: Both Ajax’s John Heitinga and Inter’s Cristian Chivu will be coaching their first career games in the Champions League with teams they once played for in the competition. Paris Saint-Germain starts the defense of its Champions League title on Wednesday when the six-game program includes two rematches of past finals.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – The Paris squad: the decision regarding Kvaratskhelia is announced
arts.sum: This Wednesday (kick-off at 9 pm, CET), Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta at the Parc des Princes for the first matchday of the 2025-2026 UEFA Champions League. Here is the squad selected by Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Hakimi, Hernandez, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi.
